body.content:
Hello Gertrude,

Good morning and thanks for your swift response. With due respect, I am a
Barrister. Abel Roberts a business adviser/financial consultant to your
late relative. I wish to share this private and important information to
you about the death of your relative who worked here in Lome Togo in west
Africa as a contractor. Since the death of my client a few years ago, his
account has been dormant without a claim and the bank has issued me a final
warning to present his relative before the dormant account could exceed the
allowance time in the bank. At the time of his death, his account balance
is US$9.6 Million and I was his financial adviser/account director till his
death. Bank legal department has just contacted me to forward the details
of the beneficiary. So I am motivated to contact you based on your
similarity of name and country so I could register you as the living
relation to ascertain approval & release of the fund to you.
Further information shall be relayed to you upon your positive response.

Kind regards,
--
Hon. Abel Roberts
Senior Attorney
Roberts & Co Chambers


[image: Sample organization]



Mobile: +22899285661
Address: Togo, Lomé, Rue des Filaos Tokoin Hôpital, 134 Togo, Lomé


[image: linkedin] <http://this-is-a-sample-url.com/>[image: facebook]
<http://this-is-a-sample-url.com/>
